For sorting -- the game won't care .. once the objects are imported, they
get placed into several distinct lists (one for living objects, one for
weapons, one for other interactive objects, etc.) anyway, so it should
basically neither help nor hurt for that information to be sorted different
:)

--Tom

-----Original Message-----
From: Deathifier [mailto:storey@...]
Sent: Monday, August 06, 2001 2:30 PM
To: gladiator@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Various pieces of info (WAS: Re: [gladiator] Re: Small bug in
my version of the scenario converter.)


Regardless yes it can be sorted.  I don't think the game cares much about
where objects are in the list, or if there can be speed gains from sorting
them a specific way (Tom?) so it should be ok.

Thats all from me,
Deathifier
